page.title: 19LAW AND ORDER IN AMMANFORD 1
page.content: Ammanford Police Station is a sub- division station, part of the Dyfed- Powys Police Force. There are 59 officers including 1 Chief Insp., 1 Insp., 5 Sgts, 1 Det. Sgt., 12 Traffic Officers, 19 PCs, 4 DCs, 3 WPCs, 2 Traffic Wardens, 2 Secretaries and 1 Telephonist. They do a lot of community work such as going around schools before every holiday talking about road safety etc. and come to talk to the sixth form about the police force as a career. They also help the mentally handicapped to go to the Gateway Club, and they help the Adult Training Centre. They also organise a "free swim week" when children are allowed to go to the local swimming pool for a whole week. Then also have rugby and cricket teams who play various local teams.
